name: Gilliam_Select_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;There are weapons in FE8R that are considered <red>Heavy Weapons</>.|There are four types of heavy weapons, <red>Blades</>, <red>Greatlances</>, <red>Warhammers</>, and <red>Greatbows</>.|They are very strong, but the enemy will always attack first when using them, and you <red>normally</> cannot multi-attack with them.|Certain skills will allow them to multi-attack, though.|They will also knock back the enemy one space after they are hit.

speak;Anna;Gilliam also has a blade as a personal weapon so take advantage of that!|Greatlances allow units to counterattack an additional 2 spaces away when defending!|Gilliam's other personal lance is a Greatlance, so Gilliam is a great unit to test heavy weapons!|Warhammers allow units to <red>Stun</><icon>Stun</> to enemies around the target!|These are powerful effects, but be careful since these can be used against you as well!|Last thing to note is that heavy weapons can deal effective damage against <red>Frozen</><icon>Frozen</> units, so try to combo those together!|All right, now go deal some massive damage!
